H0.text: In which South American country does Angostura Bitters originally come from. Argentina

H1.text: In which South American country does Angostura Bitters originally come from. Bolivia

H2.text: In which South American country does Angostura Bitters originally come from. Brazil

H3.text: In which South American country does Angostura Bitters originally come from. VEN

A4.text: The bitters were first produced in the town of Angostura (now Ciudad Bolívar, Venezuela)

A5.text: The recipe was developed by Johann Gottlieb Benjamin Siegert, a German surgeon general in Simón Bolívar's army in Venezuela
